TEXT.TITLE: ALPHA INDUSTRIES <AHA> SELLS DIVISION
TEXT.BODY: Alpha Industries Inc said it has sold its Microelectronics Division to Triax Corp for undisclosed terms, retroactive to February One. It said the division has yearly revenues of about 12 mln dlrs and makes RF microwave components for the defense electronics industry. Alpha said it plans to concentrate on the high frequency portion of the electromagnetic spectrum. Reuter
